page.title: 08TRANSPORT, ENGINE TUNING
page.content: A19 TEST AND TUNE lies behind the service station on the southbound carriageway of the A19.It is positioned in the country because the A19 is useful for road testing and testing and tuning might prove too noisy for neighbours in a town. The garage has been there for 10 years but the owner has been a tuning specialist for 25 years. The garage was specially built for tuning and testing cars. Here the latest diagnostic computer equipment is used, the owner of the station having undertaken a special course in computing and mechanical skills. Most of the work involves tuning cars for large local firms although the owner has in his time tuned speedboats, motorbikes, buses and racing cars.
